input.sentences: the family began their day at an outdoor bookfair .
there was live entertainment in the park
we had a selection of places to stop | eat and rest
there was even a running tournament that we watched .
there was also plenty of games for the children to actively participate
output.sentences: There was a festival going on that had plenty of different activities to participate in.
There were places to buy food and drinks and sit down to relax and watch people.
There was also a marathon going on that people could volunteer to run in.
There were also plenty of games for children and adults to enjoy!
